title: Shan Boodram Returns To Talk Season 3 And Give Amazing Advice!!!
description:
First ever repeat TAP IN returning guest, Shan Boodram comes on for an amazing conversation. We talk about Season 3 of Too Hot To Handle. We talk about maintaining marriage after a child, SA, love advice, and so much more!

Please Support our Sponsors!
